man. let me in this story and see how wipe the floor with those two bitches and take the glass kun to the gym. like dang. i'm pissed. poor guy.

Till now I really don’t understand this author works, so why the fuck always introduce a super mega close friends or girls that are supposed to be head over heels with the guy and the next panel some ugly as fuck muscled dudes appear from nowhere and fuck the girls and then they decide to kick out the supposed long years of love feelings for a fuck. But well isn’t like I care about it after all Freedom Prophet isn’t an author that I follow, just was curious why he always do the same .

@Blankroom Even so they are unilatery excluding the MC from the group without taking his thoughs and feelings on the matter. They are forcing the choice on him, this is not what people who consider you to be their equal, or friend, do.

Knowing their previous works, don't think too much, black-haired girl used the typical excuse of the "good guy" instead of truly saying "i don't want to have sex with YOU, yikes" He was there and ghosted just for the plot.

@Blankroom IDK man, they screaming at the top of their lungs that the FOUR of them are going to stay together forever during their orgy, and they would meet after college, while ignoring/excluding the MC seems pretty much to imply that they never saw him as one of them, he was just the useful shmuck that they kept around to help with their studies, good for serving but not for sharing in the fun. Also it seems that we can see on the black-haired chick expressions some kind of guilt  towards the MC.
